articles.title: Acer: Global Chip Shortage Will Bottleneck Laptop Production Until At Least 2022 - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: Acer has warned that laptop production is set to be restricted until 2022, as the world suffers from an ongoing components shortage.
articles.content:
Facing an ongoing global chip shortage, Acer, one of the worlds leading laptop makers, warns that production will remain bottlenecked until at least the first or second quarter of next year.

articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.title: Kobo’s latest Kindle competitor is a huge e-reader and a smart notepad - The Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Letting you read and write on a paper-like screen, the Kobo Elipsa could be an ideal paper replacement for doodlers those who mark up documents.
articles.content: You can also write directly onto documents themselves, with all your word-circling and underlining and margin-scribbling saved as you go to review later. This is especially handy when it comes to PDF… [+1063 chars]
